entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Whistler
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:22 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whistler 01:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
